name: Genokids
description:
Genokids is a cooperative hack n slash.
"Imagine being in a really popular band with your friends, you're rocking one of the best concerts of your life when some annoying interdimensional shapeshifting aliens decide to invade Earth, imagine their silly empire's name is oddly similar to your band's, imagine they also landed right into the club while you were playing, flattening both you, your fans and more importantly: your expensive equipment.
You'd be slightly annoyed, a little bit inconvinienced even... Oh, maybe a bit pissed too,  a bit...  extremely mindbendingly AGNRY"`"
Play as one of the four members of the Genokids; a crazy electronica band whose all concerts end up in violent brawling, seizures and a handful of broken ribs, as they blast their way through the invading aliens's bases to kick their butts back to whichever cosmic hole they came from.
You won't be alone though, your insane fans will follow you to the depths of hell to enjoy some good old smacking, they will cheer you up or throw you off the stage if you don't show them a good spectacle!
NOTES:
This game is still early in development, as such, multiplayer features, the hype gauge or even proper graphics are not in the demo yet.For a better experience we reccomend using an xbox controller, the demo accounts that you're using it for its tutorials so I'll leave the list of keyboard controls below in case you don't have a controller or don't want to use it.
KEYBOARD CONTROLS:
WASD; Move
Space: Jump
Shift: Dash
Left mouse: Attack
Right mouse: Lock-on
E. Q: Switch weapon
F: Finishing Move
